title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 5400 - Public Information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 5400 - Public Information

State Regulations
§ 5400.1 - Public inspection of records
§ 5400.2 - Appeals of denial of access to records
§ 5400.3 - Protection of records containing trade secrets, confidential commercial information and critical infrastructure

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 5400

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128; Public Officers Law, §
87[1][b]; L. 1973, ch. 346

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
